pages.title: Banana Plants
pages.text: Banana are a unique in the fact that they are infertile. This means that despite being a fruit, they cannot be used to plant another tree.$(br)To bring one home, one must harvest the fronds from the top, and then craft one of any size with a Dirt Bucket to obtain a banana sucker.$(br)Once one is planted it must first be raining for it to grow. Then, if it is not planted on sand or gravel, it has to be be bone-mealed.$(br)$(br)By default, banana plants can be found in both jungles and beaches.
